p: The main volatile compounds found in P. minus essential oil were aldehydes, alcohols, sesquiterpenes as well as organic acids as shown in Supplementary Figure 2 and Table 2 (Tab. 2) (References in Table 2: Ahmad et al., 2014[ 2]; Abd Rashid et al., 2019[ 1]). Dodecanal (39.4 %) and decanal (10.4 %) were the most dominant compounds identified in P. minus essential oil. Sesquiterpene found in the P. minus essential oil includes 8.61 % cyclolongifolene oxide, 3.3 % α-caryophellene, 1.13 % α-bergamotene, 0.72 % seychellene, 0.63 % β-caryophellene, 0.58 % velencene and 0.56 % isolongifolol.
